creator: ozuma5119@nifty.com
text:
tomcat-7.0-doc/cluster-howto.html:

In the section "Configuration Example", at the paragraph of "Membership", 

---
... be on a separate multicast address/port combination the the production cluster.
---

This "the the" may be a typo.
Thanks for the report. Fixed in trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.30 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
